name: pdf-merger
description: Merge student submission PDF with their grade report PDF into a single combined PDF file. Creates complete student packages for archival.
author: RuniGrader
capabilities: Find student submission PDF and grade report PDF
Merge PDFs in correct order (submission first, grade report second)
Create combined PDF with descriptive filename
Process single student or batch process all students

usage.description: Invoke as Claude CLI skill to merge student submission PDFs with grade reports

examples.name: Merge all students
examples.description: Interactive mode - Claude will ask for submissions directory and process all students
